mapper.select: /*작가 작품*/ SELECT A.MBR_NM AS mbrNm, A.MBR_SQ AS mbrSq, A.MBR_BIRTH AS mbrBirth, B.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq, B.ARTST_WORK_IMG_URL AS artstWorkImgUrl, (CASE WHEN B.ARTST_ACTVTY_PART_CD = 'PNTNG' THEN '회화' WHEN B.ARTST_ACTVTY_PART_CD = 'MLDNG' THEN '조형' WHEN B.ARTST_ACTVTY_PART_CD = 'VDMD' THEN '영상/미디어' WHEN B.ARTST_ACTVTY_PART_CD = 'INSTL' THEN '설치' ELSE '' END) AS artstActvtyPartCdTxt FROM TBL_DA_MBR_M A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_ARTST_M B ON A.MBR_SQ = B.MBR_SQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUTH_SQ = '2' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.MBR_NM ASC
